title: Elegy Beach
description: It's been twenty-seven years since the Change. An entire generation has grown up in the ruins of their parents' world. They've never known electricity or large crowds, but they take a new set of physical laws and a depopulated world for granted—until something threatens to change things back.ELEGY BEACH—a novel of reunions and departures, the joy of discovery and the pain of loss.
author: Steven R. Boyett
